mn36:10.5: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ → netaṃ kho ṭhānaṃ (bj, pts1)
mn36:11.1: Na hi nūna → naha nūna (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn36:14.12: attano → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3, pts1 potthakesu
mn36:22.4: muddhani → muddhāni (bj) | muddhānaṃ (s1-3, pts1), ūhananti → ūhanti (si) | ohananti (s1-3, km) | uhananti (mr)
mn36:22.5: muddhani abhimattheyya → muddhānaṃ abhimantheyya (si, pts1); muddhānaṃ abhimattheyya (s1-3, km)
mn36:26.6: vihāro tveva so → vihārotveveso (bj), arahato evarūpo hotī’ti → vihārotveveso arahato ti
mn36:27.7: ajjhohāreyyuṃ → ajjhohareyyuṃ (s1-3, km, pts1, mr), ajajjitaṃ → ajaddhukaṃ (bj, pts1) | jaddhukaṃ (s1-3, km)
